abstract: Mike Hale Critic's Notebook column notes that five of network television's most established shows have undergone major cast changes, spurred by contract disputes, growing movie careers and creative crises.
snippet: Five of network TV’s most established shows have undergone major cast changes since last season, spurred by contract disputes, growing movie careers and creative crises.
lead_paragraph: Five of network TV’s most established shows have undergone major cast changes since last season, spurred by contract disputes, growing movie careers and creative crises.

headline.main: Old Shows, New Faces, Big Risks
headline.print_headline: Old Shows, New Faces, Big Risks
